title: Digital Production-Based Science Learning Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and understanding of digital tool usage
context.additional_context: A Course Emphasizing Digital Content Creation and Learning Design Competencies in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technological Environments. Focuses on Cultivating Professionals' Ability to Design and Evaluate Learner-Centered Microlearning Modules in Scientific Domains

learning_goals: Learners can design digital learning objects (images, videos, infographics, etc.) on scientific topics using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can operate a formative assessment system to analyze the effectiveness of scientific learning objects through peer evaluation.
Learners can produce microlearning content within 5 minutes by applying a learning design framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
